author: LoudAndBright
post_text: December 19, 2017 at 7:03â€¯PM#1Hi,is it possible to read out the number of the last cue of a sequence?I want to write a macro, which stores a cue into the selected sequence.Afterwards I want it to label and color the cue.One possibility would be to Top the sequence and going back one step.But if it's possible I want to use the macro without going to that cue.Christoph
title: Cue number last cue
